## Awards & Accolades

Due to our dedication to client and associate excellence, our commitment to philanthropy, through our “BridgeWorkGIVES” program, as well our financial and sales growth, some of the awards BridgeWork Partners has been recognized to include the following:

[2025 Breakthrough Culture Award](https://www.hyer.co/awards-bca-press)

![](https://www.powrcdn.com/app_images%2Fresizable%2FBCA-Web-_f715d836_1749606601300.png)

0


by Hyer


Out of more than 5,000 companies and 20,000 employee survey responses across the country, only 100 organizations were recognized—and BridgeWork Partners is one of them. This award celebrates companies that are redefining what it means to create a workplace where people thrive. For us, culture is not an initiative or a checklist. It is the heartbeat of everything we do.

[More Info](https://www.bizjournals.com/dallas/news/2024/09/20/c-suite-leaders-awards-winners-announced.html)

2024 C-Suite Award

![](https://www.powrcdn.com/app_images%2Fresizable%2F1731956714_59c5d234_1742406504906.jpeg)

0


By The Dallas Business Journal


[More Info](https://www.bizjournals.com/dallas/news/2024/09/20/c-suite-leaders-awards-winners-announced.html)

2024 Ring of Honor

![](https://www.powrcdn.com/app_images%2Fresizable%2FScreenshot_dc2910e4_1742406732191.png)

0


By the Greater Dallas Hispanic Chamber of Commerce


Wanda was awarded the CEO Ring of Honor for her unwavering support and leadership to advance the mission of the Greater Dallas Hispanic Chamber of Commerce - “To support and grow the Hispanic business community in North Texas.”

[More Info](https://www.bizjournals.com/dallas/news/2024/09/20/c-suite-leaders-awards-winners-announced.html)

![](https://www.powrcdn.com/app_images%2Fresizable%2Fawards-ori_9d6b0272_1657048065072.jpeg)
